body.bibl: Katsikadeli, Christina. “Language Contact and Contact Induced Change in the Light of the (Digital) Lexicography of Greek Loanwords in the Non-Indo-European Languages of the Greco-Roman Worlds (Coptic, Hebrew/Aramaic, Syriac).” In Studies in Greek Lexicography in Honor of John N. Kazazis, edited by Georgios K. Giannakis, Christoforos Charalambakis, Franco Montanari, and Antonios Rengakos, 21–40. Trends in Classics, Supplementary Volumes 72. Berlin: Walter de Gruyter, 2019.
